name: Back2Back
description:
Back2Back

"Come together, right now".

Step into the shoes of a pair of brothers - Red and Blue - as they try to fight off hordes of enemies coming their way. Each of them is equipped with a laser to get the job done, there's one important thing to keep in mind: each laser can only kill an enemy with the same color.

Rack up the kills and the scores and help our brothers stay alive as long as possible.

Back2Back was created as an entry to the 2021.1 Brackey's Game Jam.

Source code is available for viewing at: Back2Back GitHub.
